rows.label: tlk41100221_01_msg0001
rows.name:
Soo, y'know how there's dead
sparkly spots when you're walking
around outside?

rows.label: tlk41100221_01_msg0002
rows.name: That's where my favorite bugs are!

rows.label: tlk41100221_01_msg0003
rows.name:
Well, sometimes you can catch fish
or pick veggies from them as well...

rows.label: tlk41100221_01_msg0004
rows.name:
Oh, and also? If you have a Blade who
knows their stuff, you can get a lot
more than you normally do!

rows.label: tlk41100221_01_msg0005
rows.name:
I guess it's because they're showing
you how to do it prop'ly.

rows.label: tlk41100221_01_msg0006
rows.name:
I wanna make friends with a Blade
who knows lots about bugs 'n' stuff
so I can go bug hunting!
